name: Han (V)
Lore: 'Corellian. Graduated with honors from the Imperial Academy. Dishonorably discharged. Wanders the galaxy building a reputation as a gambler and a hot-shot pilot.',
Text: 'Adds 3 to power of anything he pilots.  Force retrieval with Or Be Destroyed is immune to Secret Plans.  While armed with a blaster, Han is defense value +2.  While Or Be Destroyed on table, immune to attrition < Han''s power.(Errata Text - September 9th, 2009)',
